com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive
Class ProcessedJavaScriptArchiveMojo

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive.AbstractArchiveMojo
          com.github.jlgrock.javascriptframework.sourcearchive.ProcessedJavaScriptArchiveMojo
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.plugin.assembly.AssemblerConfigurationSource, org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
public class ProcessedJavaScriptArchiveMojo
extends AbstractArchiveMojo

This Mojo will zip everything in the declared source directory into a Source Archive file, which will be stored into the local repository.

Author:
Justin Grant
